name: Pina Colada Bread Pudding
author: Elaine Leithiser
summary: Using up coconut milk, canned pineapple juice, and stale bread products. Serve hot with ice cream, slightly warm with whipping cream, or plain.
ingredients: ⅓ cup dark brown sugar, or more to taste
2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix 1/3 cup coconut, brown sugar, rum, melted butter, and 1/4 of the pineapple juice together in a bowl
Pour into the bottom of a 2 1/2-quart casserole dish
Mix coconut milk beverage, orange juice, white sugar, eggs, remaining coconut, remaining pineapple juice, cinnamon, and nutmeg together in large bowl
Pour over bread cubes and sprinkle with a little cinnamon
Bake in the preheated oven until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes
